name: The Whole Universe and There's Not Enough Space
name_original: The Whole Universe and There's Not Enough Space
description:
The Whole Universe and There’s Not Enough Space was my submission for Ludum Dare 42’s 72 hour game jam.
Play as a space ship on the fringe of known space that is short on supplies. Rotate and puzzle together what can fit in your cargo, what gets dumped into space, and what is hooked up to your system, cementing it in place.

Controls: Space Ship

Mouse Cursor: Steer || Mouse Click: Accelerate Forward || SPACE: Open/Close your cargo

 

Controls: Cargo

Click and Drag: Reposition the cargo || "Q/E" while dragging: Rotate Cargo || "T" while Dragging: Trash the cargo || Right Click: Hook up the cargo in your hull, cementing it in place.
